00012 ModelParameterModel::ModelParameterModel(void* dataPointer, 
00013                                                                                  QObject *parent): 
00014 QAbstractTableModel(parent),
00015 modelParameters_(), table_() {
00016 
00017         Q_ASSERT_X(dataPointer, "ModelParameterModel constructor",
00018                 "Null dataPointer given as parameter");
00019 
00020         // set the pointer to the actual data structure containing the 
00021         // model parameters
00022         modelParameters_ = static_cast<
00023                 QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> > *>(dataPointer);
00024 
00025         restore();
00026 }

00031 int ModelParameterModel::rowCount( const QModelIndex & parent /*= QModelIndex() */ ) const {
00032         
00033         // not hierarchical model
00034         if (parent.isValid())
00035                 return 0;

00049 QVariant ModelParameterModel::data( const QModelIndex & index, 
00050                                                                    int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00051 
00052         if (!index.isValid())
00053                 return QVariant();
00054 
00055         // if row is invalid
00056         if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00057                 return QVariant();
00058 
00059         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00060                 
00061                 switch (index.column()) {
00062                         case 0: 
00063                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getName();
00064                         case 1:
00065                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getDataType();
00066                         case 2:
00067                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getUsageType();
00068                         case 3:
00069                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getValue();
00070                         case 4:
00071                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getDescription();
00072                         default:
00073                                 return QVariant();
00074                 }
00075         }
00076 
00077         // if unsupported role
00078         else {
00079                 return QVariant();
00080         }
00081 }

00083 QVariant ModelParameterModel::headerData( int section, 
00084                                                                                  Qt::Orientation orientation, 
00085                                                                                  int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00086 
00087         // only horizontal headers are supported
00088         if (orientation != Qt::Horizontal) 
00089                 return QVariant();
00090 
00091         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00092                 
00093                 switch (section) {
00094                         case 0:
00095                                 return tr("Name");
00096                         case 1:
00097                                 return tr("Data type");
00098                         case 2:
00099                                 return tr("Usage type");
00100                         case 3:
00101                                 return tr("Value");
00102                         case 4:
00103                                 return tr("Description");
00104                         default:
00105                                 return QVariant();
00106                 }
00107         }
00108 
00109         // if unsupported role
00110         else {
00111                 return QVariant();
00112         }
00113 }

00115 bool ModelParameterModel::setData( const QModelIndex& index, 
00116                                                                   const QVariant& value, 
00117                                                                   int role /*= Qt::EditRole */ ) {
00118 
00119         if (!index.isValid())
00120                 return false;
00121 
00122         // if row is invalid
00123         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00124                 return false;
00125 
00126         if (role == Qt::EditRole) {
00127                 
00128                 switch (index.column()) {
00129                         case 0: {
00130 
00131                                 // if name changes then the map has to change the indexing also
00132                                 QString oldKey = table_.value(index.row())->getName();
00133 
00134                                 // remove the item with old key and insert the value with new key
00135                                 //QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> modParam = modelParameters_->take(oldKey);
00136                                 //modelParameters_->insert(value.toString(), modParam);
00137 
00138                                 table_[index.row()]->setName(value.toString());
00139                                 break;                          
00140                                         }
00141                         case 1: {
00142                                 table_[index.row()]->setDataType(value.toString());
00143                                 break;
00144                                         }
00145                         case 2: {
00146                                 table_[index.row()]->setUsageType(value.toString());
00147                                 break;
00148                                         }
00149                         case 3: {
00150                                 table_[index.row()]->setValue(value.toString());
00151                                 break;
00152                                         }
00153                         case 4: {
00154                                 table_[index.row()]->setDescription(value.toString());
00155                                 break;
00156                                         }
00157                         default:
00158                                 return false;
00159 
00160                 }
00161                 emit dataChanged(index, index);
00162                 return true;
00163         }
00164         // if role is not supported
00165         else {
00166                 return false;
00167         }
00168 }

00172         if (!index.isValid())
00173                 return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00174 
00175         return Qt::ItemIsSelectable | Qt::ItemIsEditable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled;

00178 void ModelParameterModel::onRemoveRow( int row ) {
00179         
00180         // if row is invalid
00181         if (row < 0 || row >= table_.size())
00182                 return;
00183 
00184         beginRemoveRows(QModelIndex(), row, row);
00185 
00186         // remove the object from the map
00187         table_.removeAt(row);
00188 
00189         endRemoveRows();
00190 
00191         // tell also parent widget that contents have been changed
00192         emit contentChanged();
00193 }
00194 
00195 void ModelParameterModel::onAddRow() {
00196 
00197         beginInsertRows(QModelIndex(), table_.size(), table_.size());
00198         
00199         table_.append(QSharedPointer<ModelParameter>(new ModelParameter()));
00200         
00201         endInsertRows();
00202 
00203         // tell also parent widget that contents have been changed
00204         emit contentChanged();
00205 }

00207 bool ModelParameterModel::isValid() const {
00208         
00209         for (int i = 0; i < table_.size(); ++i) {
00210                 
00211                 // if one model parameter is not valid
00212                 if (!table_.value(i)->isValid()) {
00213                         
00214                         emit errorMessage(tr("ModelParameter %1 is not valid").arg(
00215                                 table_.value(i)->getName()));
00216                         return false;
00217                 }
00218         }
00219         return true;
00220 }
00221 
00222 void ModelParameterModel::apply() {
00223 
00224         if (!isValid())
00225                 return;
00226 
00227         // remove old model parameters from original model
00228         modelParameters_->clear();
00229 
00230         for (int i = 0; i < table_.size(); ++i) {
00231                 modelParameters_->insert(table_.value(i)->getName(), table_.value(i));
00232         }
00233 }
00234 
00235 void ModelParameterModel::restore() {
00236 
00237         beginResetModel();
00238 
00239         // remove old model parameters
00240         table_.clear();
00241 
00242         // add all model parameters to the table
00243         foreach (QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> modelParameter, *modelParameters_) {
00244 
00245                 // create a copy of the model parameter
00246                 table_.append(QSharedPointer<ModelParameter>(
00247                         new ModelParameter(*modelParameter.data())));
00248         }
00249 
00250         endResetModel();
00251 }
